title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Competencies: 3D Geometry Inquiry-Based Learning: SketchUp Mak

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners enhance spatial perception by performing rotation, symmetry, and cross-sectional extraction of 3D shapes using SketchUp Make.
Learners strengthen abstract thinking skills (analysis, proof, reasoning) about 3D shapes through activities based on van Hiele theory.
Learners can explain and evaluate 3D geometry concepts through verbal and non-verbal methods via collaboration with peers.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
